description.english: have Commander cells Crit Abyss cell heads 100 times.
have COMMANDER cells use MULTI commands 30 times.
(DEPTH 2+) have at least 5 cells with Radiation.
have Commander cells reduce incoming Damage with Armour 30 times.
read every Commander & Abyss cell description in the Database.
(DEPTH 3) achieve victory in VIRUS mode OR speak its name.
have Poison be applied to Abyss cells 30 times.
(DEPTH 3) achieve victory in any mode with the Atrax commander.
have Mute be applied to cells 30 times.
eliminate a Commander cell with a different Commander cell.
have cells use Reflect to redirect commands 30 times.
have Commander cells with Swift move 30 tiles after using commands.
have Glue be applied to cells 30 times.
have Commander cells heal 100 Size with commands.
achieve victory in any mode with the Joker commander.
visit the Discord via the button on the Main Menu.
have Commander cells Crit Abyss cell heads 30 times OR activate 100 Buff Tiles.
view the Credits from the Main Menu.
have all 4 starter cells equipped at the same time during a run.
lose on Commander turn 1 without moving, using commands or manually ending the run.
win a mission on Commander turn 1.
eliminate 3 Abyss cells with a single use of a MULTI command.
have a Commander cell with Reflect redirect its command back to an Abyss cell that also has Reflect.
have a Commander cell with Move 30.
have a Commander cell with Size 30.
deal at least Damage 10 with a single command use on a single target.
deal at least Crit 10 with a single command use.
have a Commander cell with Armour, Shield & Reflect all at the same time.
have an Abyss cell with at least Poison 5.
have an Abyss cell with both Glue & Mute at the same time.
Bleach, Reroll & Banish a combined total of 300 shop offers.
play 30 runs (you can't cheese it so don't even try).
eliminate the same Abyss cell 100 times.
achieve victory in any mode where only ABYSS cells with A DNA aren't extinct.
achieve victory in any mode where only ABYSS cells with C DNA aren't extinct.
achieve victory in any mode where only ABYSS cells with G DNA aren't extinct.
achieve victory in any mode where only ABYSS cells with T DNA aren't extinct.
achieve victory in any mode with at least 4 of the same cell.
achieve victory in any mode without taking Damage.
achieve victory in any mode without moving any of your cells.
achieve victory in any mode without using commands.
achieve victory in any mode with every cell.
achieve victory in any mode with every commander.
achieve victory in any mode with every gadget.
achieve victory in any mode with every perk.
(DEPTH 3) achieve victory in any mode with every cell.
(DEPTH 3) achieve victory in any mode with every commander.
(DEPTH 3) achieve victory in any mode with every gadget.
(DEPTH 3) achieve victory in any mode with every perk.
